posts.message:
Join FREE Webinar xRM: The Future of CRM

Organizations are realizing that to be effective at CRM, they have to be effective at xRM or Extended Relationship Management, also known as Any Relationship Management. And Microsoft Dynamics CRM is the engine for delivering xRM. 

Register Now:

Feb 12, 2013 2:00 PM EET http://bit.ly/XU6hJp

Feb 12, 2013 1:00 PM EST http://bit.ly/XU6yvQ

Feb 13, 2013 3:00 PM AEDT http://bit.ly/XL9iec

(Windows 8 / Windows Phone 8 / WPF / Silverlight ) XAML Developer  
 
Job description
• Work with Visual Designers to implement elegant interactive solutions to complex interaction problems with polished XAML code.
• Transform prototypes into fully functional new interactions and animations using XAML and WPF.
• Design and develop new XAML components utilizing Microsoft Blend.
• Analyze current codebase to make recommendations for WPF and Silverlight compatibility while utilizing a strong best practices approach
Requirements
• Experience with web technologies (XAML, HTML, CSS, etc.).
• Basic understanding of the MVVM framework and MEF.
• Exposure to C# development using technologies including: C#, .NET 1.1-4.0, Web Services, etc.
• Good understanding of layout and basic user interface design principles.
• Preferred experience with Microsoft Expression Blend or a similar design tool
• Portfolio showcasing a track record of creating strong XAML/WPF interactive solutions.

If this sounds like something you could do, please apply to join our NUITEX team!

Just send us email along with your resume and current/expected salary to : jobs@nuitex.com 
(NOTE: Please write 'XMLDEV'  in email subject)

Specification of Ubiquiti UniFi Access Point Enterprise WiFi System Long Range
UniFi AP-Long Range (UAP-LR) Features.
Larger Range up to 600 ft. It also offers 802.11n MIMO, with speeds of up to 300 Mbps.
Power over Ethernet (PoE) functionality, which allows both power and data to be carried over a single Ethernet cable to the device.
Intuitive UniFi Controller Software Install, configure, and manage all of your UniFi AP devices with the intuitive and easy-to-learn UniFi Controller user interface (no special training needed).
Expandable Unlimited scalability. Build wireless networks as small or big as needed. Start with one and expand to thousands while maintaining a single unified management system.
Save money and save time Unlike traditional enterprise WiFi systems utilizing a hardware WiFi switch, UniFi uses a  virtual client/server application that requires zero cost and no additional hardware.
